index.title: //About
index.paragraph1: Threatshade is an innovative cybersecurity startup based in Ireland, specialising in cutting-edge OffSec (offensive security) solutions. Unlike traditional security providers, we combine advanced cybersecurity with a strong commitment to environmental responsibility. We believe in making a positive impact, which is why a portion of our earnings from every successful security engagement is donated to environmental charities. At Threatshade, we go beyond profit, offering ethical cybersecurity practices and supporting sustainable initiatives. Our mission is to protect both your digital assets and the planet, with a focus on actionable, meaningful solutions rather than empty promises of greenwashing

services.title: //Penetration Testing
services.paragraph1: Penetration testing (pen test) is a simulated cyber attack conducted to assess the security of your applications, systems, and network infrastructure. Our team of certified ethical hackers will identify and exploit vulnerabilities within a predefined scope and timeframe.
services.paragraph2: This proactive approach helps detect and address weaknesses before cybercriminals can exploit them. After the test, you will receive a comprehensive penetration test report outlining all discovered vulnerabilities, their severity levels, and actionable remediation recommendations to strengthen your cybersecurity posture.

services.title: //Vulnerability Scanning
services.paragraph1: Our vulnerability scan uses advanced automated processes to identify security weaknesses across your systems, networks, and applications. /n /n We scan for common issues such as outdated software, misconfigurations, and missing security patches. After automated scanning, manual verification ensures that vulnerabilities are accurately identified, minimising false positives.
services.paragraph2: The final report includes a detailed list of vulnerabilities, their severity, and recommendations for effective vulnerability remediation to enhance your overall cybersecurity defence.

services.title: //Threat Modelling
services.paragraph1: Threat modelling is a critical approach to understanding and mitigating security risks in your applications and systems.
services.paragraph2: Our team works with you to identify valuable assets, analyse potential threats, and evaluate existing security controls. This structured process allows us to pinpoint potential vulnerabilities early in the development phase, providing a clear plan for how to defend against attacks. /n /n By integrating threat modelling into your development lifecycle, you can proactively address risks and enhance the security of your organisation from the outset.

contact.title: //GDPR Compliance
contact.paragraph1: At Threatshade, safeguarding your privacy is our top priority. By submitting your information, you consent to the collection, processing, and storage of your personal data in full compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). We ensure that your data is only used for the specified purposes and will never be shared with third parties without your explicit consent. For more details, please review our Privacy Policy.

policy.title: //Introduction
policy.paragraph1: ThreatShade ("we," "us," or "our") is committed to protecting and respecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines our practices regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal data when you use our services, including our penetration testing services.

policy.title: //Information We Collect
policy.paragraph1: We may collect the following types of personal data:
policy.paragraph2: Contact Information: Such as name, email address, phone number, and company details.
policy.paragraph3: Technical Data: Including IP addresses, browser type and version, time zone setting, browser plug-in types and versions, operating system and platform, and other technology on the devices you use to access our website or services.
policy.paragraph4: Usage Data: Information about how you use our website and services.

policy.title: //How We Use Your Information
policy.paragraph1: We use your personal data for the following purposes:
policy.paragraph2: To provide and maintain our services.
policy.paragraph3: To notify you about changes to our services.
policy.paragraph4: To allow you to participate in interactive features of our services when you choose to do so.
policy.paragraph6: To gather analysis or valuable information so that we can improve our services.
policy.paragraph7: To monitor the usage of our services.
policy.paragraph8: To detect, prevent, and address technical issues.

policy.title: //Sharing Your Information
policy.paragraph1: We do not share your personal data with third parties except in the following cases:
policy.paragraph3: For compliance with a legal obligation.
policy.paragraph4: To protect and defend our rights or property.
policy.paragraph5: To prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with our services.
policy.paragraph6: To protect the personal safety of users of our services or the public.

policy.title: //Data Security
policy.paragraph1: We take the security of your personal data seriously and use appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect it against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction, or damage.

policy.title: //Your Rights
policy.paragraph1: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
policy.paragraph2: Access: You can request access to your personal data
policy.paragraph3: Rectification: You can request correction of any inaccurate or incomplete data.
policy.paragraph4: Erasure: You can request deletion of your personal data, subject to certain conditions.
policy.paragraph5: Restriction: You can request the restriction of processing of your personal data.
policy.paragraph6: Portability: You can request transfer of your personal data to another party.
policy.paragraph7: Objection: You can object to the processing of your personal data.

policy.title: //Changes to This Privacy Policy
policy.paragraph1: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
